content:
Summarize this email chain between the client and venue coordinator.
                    Focus on: organizer, event type, timing, rooms, guest count, 
                    catering, AV needs, drink packages, layout, and special requests.

                    Email content:
                    To: Taco Taco Time: 11/24/2024 16:55 (an hour ago)
Hello!My husband and I were in today. Thank you to Michelle who showed us the spaces and answered questions!I would like to book the front space for Saturday, Feb. 22, 2025 from 7:30 pm 11:00 pm. We will do a combination of our own music and some karaoke!I am anticipating around 40 guests.I would like to do the $16 menu option. Perhaps I could come back in the new year to settle on exactly which appetizers and tacos?How would you like me to pay the deposit?Thank you very much!Shannon

**Organizer:** Shannon  
**Event Type:** Private event (type unspecified, but suggested karaoke and personal music)  
**Timing:** Saturday, February 22, 2025, from 7:30 PM to 11:00 PM  
**Rooms:** Moonlight Lounge (referred to as the front space)  
**Guest Count:** Approximately 40 guests  
**Catering:** $16 menu option (two tacos and appetizers); Shannon plans to return in the new year to finalize the specific items  
**AV Needs:** Combination of personal music and karaoke  
**Drink Packages:** Not specified in the email, but options are available  
**Layout:** Not explicitly mentioned, but it can be inferred that a setup suitable for karaoke and personal music will be required  
**Special Requests:** None explicitly stated, but Shannon indicates a desire to finalize menu items at a later date and inquires about the deposit process.
